description: This is the main application component for a React-based web game called 'Fruit Ninja Online'. It manages theme toggling, screen navigation (Home, Game, Results), and integrates other components such as Game, HomeScreen, and ResultsScreen. It also determines debug mode based on environment variables.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional component managing the app state, theme, and screen navigation.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles between light and dark themes.

methods.name: handleStartSolo
methods.description: Resets results and starts the game in solo mode.

methods.name: handleGameOver
methods.description: Handles the end of the game, storing results and moving to results screen.
